content:
On the night of March 8, 2024, the enemy attacked the South and East of Ukraine, using one C-300 anti-aircraft managed missile, two controlled Aviation missiles X-59 and 37 Shahaneda UAVs.

About thisreported in the morning of March 8Air Force of the Armed Forces.

According to them, the Shahledi was launched from the Balaklava area in occupied Crimea.

As a result of combat work, 33 "Shahda" was shot down within the Odessa and Kharkiv regions.

Air Force Air Force, mobile fire groups of Defense Forces of Ukraine, radio electronic struggle, were involved in the reflection of the air attack.

BeforeIt was reportedIn Sumy, Shahhediv attacks have damaged residential buildings and cars.
title: Defense forces knocked down 33 out of 37 Shahmed
description: This was reported in the morning of March 8 by the Air Force of the Armed Forces. According to them, "Shahda" ...
author: Army Inform
